Package infodynamics.measures.discrete

Class SInfoCalculatorDiscrete

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.discrete.InfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
      • infodynamics.measures.discrete.MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
        • infodynamics.measures.discrete.SInfoCalculatorDiscrete
  • public class SInfoCalculatorDiscrete
extends MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete

    Computes the S-information of a given multivariate int[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete).

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete.

    References:

    • Rosas, F., Mediano, P., Gastpar, M, Jensen, H., "Quantifying high-order interdependencies via multivariate extensions of the mutual information", Physical Review E 100, (2019) 032305.
    Author:
    Pedro A.M. Mediano (email, www)

        public SInfoCalculatorDiscrete​(int base,

        Construct an instance.
        Parameters:
        base - number of symbols for each variable. E.g. binary variables are in base-2.
        numVars - numbers of joint variables that DTC will be computed over.
